author: Michael McWhertor
title: Pokémon Go players are running out of Poké Balls while stuck at home
description: As Pokémon Go players quarantine themselves during the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic, a game meant to be played outdoors is trying to adapt. Currently, players are experiencing a shortage of Poke Balls.
content: Pokémon Go players and the people who make Pokémon Go are adjusting to new social distancing and self-isolation rules that run counter to the sharing, outdoor nature of the game. Developer Niantic is tweaking game rules and postponing events in Pokémon Go to … [+3172 chars]
